Max Bialystock.Action: Blows a kiss and waves goodbye to the little old lady, responds graciously to her affectionate gestures.
Face quickly resumes expression of despair and disgust after the little old lady leaves.
Engages warmly with an investor, showing charm and gratitude while maintaining an appearance of friendliness.
His face shifts quickly from a charming smile to despair and disgust after the investor leaves, suggesting internal worry or stress.
Swiftly checks his pocket watch and immediately moves to consult his investor files, indicating organized behavior and awareness of his business responsibilities.

Systematically organizes and locates the photograph of a specific investor using a key and photographs in labeled niches.
Greets the little old lady leeringly, embraces her passionately.
